page.title: 05The Arts in Bangor
page.content: Bangor is not a great centre for the Arts but it has some activities. The focal point of these activities is {Theatre Gwynedd}which seats 300 and is owned by the{University}but used by many outside bodies such as{Cwymni {Theatr Cymru}and the{Bangor Festival {Players}.The theatre was built in the early 1970's.Welsh as well as English plays are performed there and this summer the{Bangor Festival Players}are putting on 'Godspell'. There is a small art gallery and museum in Bangor.At present an exhibition of North Wales Landscapes by F.W.Heyes is being shown there while a week or two ago pictures by children of local schools were on show The{Plaza cinema}is the only one in Bangor.It has recently been remodelled to include two cinemas and one bingo hall.
